description: React functional component 'CaseInformation' that renders a form for editing case details like deceased name, service type, dates, preferences, and additional notes. Uses context for state management and local state for editing and save confirmation.

methods.name: change
methods.description: Handles input change events, updates local state with new value depending on input name.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Dispatches updated case info to context and shows a temporary 'Saved' indicator.
